medicines.name: Paracetamol
medicines.description: Used to treat mild to moderate pain and reduce fever.

medicines.name: Amoxicillin
medicines.description: An antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections.

medicines.name: Ibuprofen
medicines.description: Used to reduce fever and relieve pain or inflammation.

medicines.name: Ciprofloxacin
medicines.description: An antibiotic effective against a wide range of bacterial infections.

medicines.name: Metformin
medicines.description: Used to control high blood sugar in patients with type 2 diabetes.

medicines.name: Omeprazole
medicines.description: Reduces stomach acid and is used for heartburn and acid reflux.

medicines.name: Aspirin
medicines.description: Used to reduce pain, fever, or inflammation.

medicines.name: Cetirizine
medicines.description: Antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms.

medicines.name: Losartan
medicines.description: Used to treat high blood pressure and protect the kidneys.

medicines.name: Atorvastatin
medicines.description: Lowers cholesterol and reduces the risk of heart disease.

medicines.name: Azithromycin
medicines.description: Used to treat various types of bacterial infections.

medicines.name: Insulin
medicines.description: Used to control blood sugar levels in people with diabetes.

medicines.name: Hydrochlorothiazide
medicines.description: Treats high blood pressure and fluid retention.

medicines.name: Levothyroxine
medicines.description: Used to treat hypothyroidism (underactive thyroid).

medicines.name: Amlodipine
medicines.description: Used to treat high blood pressure and angina (chest pain).

medicines.name: Prednisone
medicines.description: Used to treat inflammation, allergies, and autoimmune diseases.

medicines.name: Clopidogrel
medicines.description: Prevents blood clots and reduces the risk of stroke or heart attack.

medicines.name: Gabapentin
medicines.description: Used to treat nerve pain and certain types of seizures.

medicines.name: Metoprolol
medicines.description: Used to treat high blood pressure, chest pain, and heart failure.

medicines.name: Warfarin
medicines.description: Prevents blood clots in veins, arteries, lungs, and the heart.
